com.mjun.mtransition

类 MTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mjun.mtransition.MTransition
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ITransitPrepareListener

    public class MTransition
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransitPrepareListener

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cancel()
      取消场景切换动画 Cancel Transition
      void clear()
      清除保存的动画数据 Clear all data of Transition
      MTransitionPage fromPage()
      获取FromPage的动画数据 Get FromPage's Transition data
      MTransitionBundle getBundle()
      获取传递数据的Bundle Get the Bundle Passing Data
      long getDuration()
      获取整个场景动画时长 Get the duration of Transition
      java.lang.String getName()
      获取当前MTransition对应的名字 Get the name of Transition
      void gotoCeil()
      从当前的动画进度，反向执行结束，一般在跟手操作使用，onBeginDrag() Reverse Transition from the current progress, generally used when you need to follow the touch event, onBeginDrag()
      void gotoFloor()
      从当前的动画进度，正向执行结束，一般在跟手操作使用，onBeginDrag() Continue Transition from the current progress, generally used when you need to follow the touch event, onBeginDrag()
      boolean isRunning()
      场景切换动画是否正在执行 Wheater Transition is running
      void onBeginDrag()
      如果需要跟手滑动执行动画，那么必须在开始跟手的时候执行该方法 具体请参考Demo示例 If you need to follow the touch event to perform the Transiton, you must call this method at the beginning For details, see the Demos
      void onPrepare(MTransitionView container)
      当 MTransitionPage 设置好Container时回调 Callback when MTransitionPage sets Container
      void reverse()
      从当前动画进度反向执行动画 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Reverse the Transiton from current progress NOTE: You must call MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener) before calling this method; or will throw an exception
      void setDuration(long duration)
      统一设置所有动画的动画时长，如果之前已经在BaseAnimFactor#setDuration(long)单独设置过，则以单独设置为准 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Set the duration of all animations uniformly.
      void setOnTransitListener(OnTransitListener listener)
      设置动画监听器 Set the OnTransitListener to Transition
      void setProgress(float progress)
      设置当前动画的进度 Set current Transition progress
      void start()
      从头开始执行场景切换动画 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Start the Transition NOTE: You must call MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener) before calling this method; or will throw an exception
      MTransitionPage toPage()
      获取ToPage的动画数据 Get ToPage's Transition data

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromPage

        @NonNull
public MTransitionPage fromPage()
        获取FromPage的动画数据 Get FromPage's Transition data
        返回:
        MTransition实例对象

      • toPage

        @NonNull
public MTransitionPage toPage()
        获取ToPage的动画数据 Get ToPage's Transition data
        返回:
        MTransition实例对象

      • start

        public void start()
        从头开始执行场景切换动画 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Start the Transition NOTE: You must call MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener) before calling this method; or will throw an exception

      • reverse

        public void reverse()
        从当前动画进度反向执行动画 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Reverse the Transiton from current progress NOTE: You must call MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener) before calling this method; or will throw an exception

      • onBeginDrag

        public void onBeginDrag()
        如果需要跟手滑动执行动画，那么必须在开始跟手的时候执行该方法 具体请参考Demo示例 If you need to follow the touch event to perform the Transiton, you must call this method at the beginning For details, see the Demos

      • gotoFloor

        public void gotoFloor()
        从当前的动画进度，正向执行结束，一般在跟手操作使用，onBeginDrag() Continue Transition from the current progress, generally used when you need to follow the touch event, onBeginDrag()

      • gotoCeil

        public void gotoCeil()
        从当前的动画进度，反向执行结束，一般在跟手操作使用，onBeginDrag() Reverse Transition from the current progress, generally used when you need to follow the touch event, onBeginDrag()

      • clear

        public void clear()
        清除保存的动画数据 Clear all data of Transition

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(float progress)
        设置当前动画的进度 Set current Transition progress
        参数:
        progress - 动画执行进度，取值范围[0, 1]

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        取消场景切换动画 Cancel Transition

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(long duration)
        统一设置所有动画的动画时长，如果之前已经在BaseAnimFactor#setDuration(long)单独设置过，则以单独设置为准 NOTE：必须先调用MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)之后，才能调用该方法,否则会报错 Set the duration of all animations uniformly. If you have previously set it separately in BaseAnimFactor#setDuration(long), the individual settings will prevail. NOTE: You must call MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener) before calling this method; or will throw an exception
        参数:
        duration - 动画时长

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        获取整个场景动画时长 Get the duration of Transition
        返回:
        动画时长

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        场景切换动画是否正在执行 Wheater Transition is running
        返回:

      • onPrepare

        public void onPrepare(MTransitionView container)
        从接口复制的说明: ITransitPrepareListener
        当 MTransitionPage 设置好Container时回调 Callback when MTransitionPage sets Container
        指定者:
        onPrepare 在接口中 ITransitPrepareListener

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        获取当前MTransition对应的名字 Get the name of Transition
        返回:
        当前MTransition对应的名字

      • setOnTransitListener

        public void setOnTransitListener(OnTransitListener listener)
        设置动画监听器 Set the OnTransitListener to Transition
        参数:
        listener - OnTransitListener

      • getBundle

        public MTransitionBundle getBundle()
        获取传递数据的Bundle Get the Bundle Passing Data
        返回:
        MTransitionBundle，用法如Bundle一致
